Description: file extension or label detailing the format of the file
Valid Values: csv, tsv, txt, xlsx, xls, fcs, docx, erate, rec, info, vcf, dose, tbi, fam, bim, bed, bam, h5, mtx, bai, rds, pdf, tgz, zip, fastq, parquet, geojson, tar.gz, zip

Description: Name of the funding program that supported the generation of data and associated files
Accelerating Medicines Partnership rheumatoid arthritis and systemic lupus erythematosus. Is a valid value for Program attribute and when selected it triggers a conditional dependency.
A label noting which AMP RA/SLE program phase generated the data.
High level classification of the file content
File that contains machine or code generated data that is experimentally derived. Is a valid value of Resource Type and when selected triggers conditional dependencies for additional attributes.
DependsOn: Data Type, Assay, Data Level, Specimen Modality, Platform, Individual ID, Biospecimen ID, Biospecimen Type

Description: High level classification of the type of data contained in the file, loosely related to the experimental method or biological entity that is being profiled. Select all that apply.
Valid Values: transcriptomics, immune repertoire profiling, proteomics, multiomic, epigenomics, genomics, metabolomics, lipidomics, microbiome, histology, immunostaining

Description: General classification to differential between omics profiling modalities.
Level of data processing applied to file. Levels referred to pre-defined standards of processing for the given assay.
Label specifying the experimental method or assay used to generate the data. For multiomic datasets with concomitant profiling of biospecimen select all that apply.
Valid Values: scRNASeq, CyTOF, 10x Xenium, Olink, CITESeq, snRNASeq, snATACSeq

Description: A transcriptomics assay that profiles gene expression at single-cell resolution. Is a valid value of Assay that triggers conditional dependencies for additional attributes.

Valid Values: 10x Chromium 3 GEX, 10x Chromium 5 GEX, 10x Universal 3 GEX, 10x Universal 5 GEX, 10x Chromium Flex, CEL-Seq2

Description: Primary equipment or device used to generate the data.
Valid Values:
Illumina NextSeq500, 
Illumina HiSeq2500, 
Illumina NovaSeq 6000, Helios Mass Cytometer, Hyperion

Description: A flag indicating whether or not a file contains data pertaining to > 1 specimen.

Any file that contains curated data describing an experiment and experimental-derived data, including metadata about study subjects, biospecimens, protocols, assay reagents, marker panels, and ID mappings. Is a valid value of Resource Type triggers conditional dependencies for additional attributes.
A label further classifying the content of the metadata file.
A file that contains a graphical representation of data such as a scatter plot, heatmap, etc. Is a valid value of Resource Type and may trigger conditional dependencies for additional attributes.
Files that contain code such as scripts, code packages, and software binary files. Is a valid value of Resource Type and may trigger conditional dependencies for additional attributes.
